books.title: Shyamchi Aai
books.author: Sane Guruji
books.overview: A touching autobiographical novel about Sane Guruji's childhood and the profound influence of his mother.

books.title: Shriman Yogi
books.author: Ranjit Desai
books.overview: A historical novel based on the life of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's father, Shahaji Raje Bhosale.

books.title: Yayati
books.author: Vishnu Sakharam Khandekar
books.overview: A mythological novel exploring themes of desire, renunciation, and the human condition.

books.title: Mi Navhech
books.author: Pu La Deshpande
books.overview: An autobiographical work by renowned Marathi writer Pu La Deshpande, known for its humor and wit.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.overview: An epic fantasy tale set in Middle-earth.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.overview: The story of a young wizard who discovers his magical abilities.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.overview: A story of love, wealth, and the American Dream in the Roaring Twenties.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.overview: A coming-of-age story narrated by a disillusioned teenager.

books.title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
books.author: Gabriel García Márquez
books.overview: A magical realism novel chronicling the history of the Buendía family.
